Mudcats Stats

Ben Swanson

June 04, 2022

1 Offensive

1.1 Team Leaders

1.1.1 Average

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(AVG, .9) < AVG) %>%
  select(fullName, AVG) %>%
  kable()
fullName AVG
Tom Liking 0.500
Shea Huntington 0.667

1.1.2 OPS

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OPS, .9) < OPS) %>%
  select(fullName, OPS) %>%
  kable()
fullName OPS
Tom Liking 1.000
Shea Huntington 1.417

1.1.3 OBP

offenseSelect %>% 
  filter(quantile(OBP, .9) < OBP) %>%
  select(fullName, OBP) %>%
  kable()
fullName OBP
Tom Liking 0.50
Shea Huntington 0.75

2 Individual Stats

2.1 Dorsey

offenseSelect %>%
  filter(Last == "Dorsey") %>%
  select(-Last, -fullName) %>%
  kable()
GP PA AB H singles doubles triples HR RBI R HBP AVG SLG OPS OBP
1 4 4 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 0.25 0.25 0.5 0.25
